txt.en: The Dwarves of Ered Luin have discovered a field full of buried treasures, and people are flocking in to test their luck at digging up rare finds.
The Dwarves of Ered Luin have discovered a field full of buried treasures, and folks are flocking in to test their luck at digging up rare finds.
Complete the quest to receive a map to the Treasure Field!
Complete to receive a map to the Treasure Fields!
The Dwarves of Ered Luin have discovered a field full of buried treasures, and people are flocking in to test their luck at digging up rare finds.
Come join the dwarves on their hunt for treasure!
